div.p: Some of the IHE MMA transactions make use of patient-specific information. Even those that merely retrieve empty forms could be abused by malicious actors to corrupt the form - resulting in the potential subsequent exposure of patient data. For this reason, all MMA transactions must be appropriately secured with access limited to authorized individuals, data protected while in transit and appropriate audit measures taken.
